response.original_title: Eddie Ray - Silence of the Jams
response.overview: In a dystopian future where the world falls into silence, and all live music has stopped, robots aka smartphones now rule the world.  Having only ever used his trusty old Nokia, Eddie Ray missed the memo, or meme.  With a motorbike as his trusty steed, in the wild west of the Sunshine Coast, and haunted by the songs in his head, Eddie must journey to find the weapon that can beat the machines.  Music.
response.tagline: A comedy motorcycle cowboy post apocalyptic musicalâ€¦ sort of thing.
response.title: Eddie Ray - Silence of the Jams
